roleset.name: to remove or keep from active participation

role.descr: person preventing, removing arg1 from participation
sidelined from what? mention of activity arg1 can't participate in

example.name: Arg 1 only, passive
example.text: Fresh buying interest was sidelined ahead of a potential market - affecting debate in the House of Commons set for Tuesday .

propbank.arg: ahead of a potential market - affecting debate in the House of Commons set for Tuesday

example.name: All args
example.text: Babe Ruth 's hot - dog - eating binges were so extreme , they sidelined him from games .

roleset.note: SIDELINE-V NOTES: Roleset based on wsj-nw instances. Framed by Claire. (from sideline.01-v)
